static SDValue replaceInChain (SelectionDAG *CurDAG, SDValue Chain, SDValue Old, SDValue New)
 

Function Documentation

static SDValue replaceInChain ( SelectionDAG *  CurDAG,
SDValue  Chain,
SDValue  Old,
SDValue  New 
)
static

Given a chain return a new chain where any appearance of Old is replaced by New. There must be at most one instruction between Old and Chain and this instruction must be a TokenFactor. Returns an empty SDValue if these conditions don't hold.
